Seem to be built ok and they look nice ... But they run small. With other wide toe box shoes size 11 is great for me. These size 11 wides pinch badly and my toes are up against the front of the shoe. Next time I will try a 12 wide.

The shoes seems to be great quality. They are just way to small for the size. I have tried both 8 and 9 and they both are way too small. So, gonna try a 10 next. I wear 8 wide in other shoes that fit fine but not these.

This an inexpensive sneaker. Very comfortable and flexible. The drawback for me is that I have a high instep and because the instep part is sewn to the sides it can’t accommodate my foot comfortably. I’m so sad 😞
Cheap junk . Hurt my feet .

Bought these for my husband. He loved the light feet color, says they are very comfortable. I took one start off because they don’t slip on as easily as they claim. The tongue of the shoe gets caught when he tries to slip on. He’s still very happy with them and would buy another pair.
So far so good

I wear 10.5 so ordered 11 based on reviews.  The shoes were too small.  The uppers seem really low and don’t have enough room at the toes, so they aren’t wearable.  Otherwise they seem nice, but the fit is the most important feature.

评论概述: Very comfortable to walk in all day.
评论详情: I had never bought the brand before.  I am very happy with how comfortable the shoes are to be in all day.  Light weight and seem to be durable.
Worthless. I am reminded that you get what you pay for.

I purchased these to use for work in fast food. In the description, it says these are non-slip, but whatever non-slip pattern they use is all but useless. Still, they fit great, and I intend to keep them as everyday shoes anyway.
I wear wide shoes and these fit great. They are a little soft soled but it isn't to bad.

They are what you’d expect for the price. They have soft insoles that are more fluffy than supportive.

One of the most comfortable shoes Ive worn. Normally Id have to wear insoles, but with these, I didn’t have to. I wear 10.5, so I reordered to size 11 wide, it is about the right size. 评论概述: Nice looking and well made but hot
评论详情: Not well ventilated, tend to be hot. Dimples in the shoe's shape at the toes.

I bought these for my husband because they are suppose to have a wide footbed. I ordered size wide in a size bigger than he wears to make sure they were wide enough. They were too narrow! He's very picky about shoes and likes them lose. These were not even wide.

These shoes were immediately comfortable. I walked almost 10 miles in them one day and my feet felt great beginning to end! And they look great. They perform better that shoes I bought before at twice the price!! I got the gray ones and I'm about to order a pair in black!!

There is little to no arch support in these shoes by design.  They are quite comfortable though.  The size is about a 1/2 size too small so make sure to order that 1/2 size up.  The airflow is great, and the size of the toe box is pretty great too.  These lace up your arch pretty far and have taller heel straps than many similar shoes.  This is a a great, comfortable shoe for daily wear.
Order a size up. They are also very short top to bottom up in the toe. My toes feel squished.
About only thing is little snug at front portion of shoe.

My son in Middle School has a wide foot, I was unsure about getting these because they do look wide to the eye. I'm glad I made the purchase he loves them so much so comfortable. Also the black looks like a normal sneaker when on the foot. Easy to put in and off, sooooo comfortable.

评论概述: Very comfortable for walking and daily use
评论详情: I’ve been wearing these for daily activities and they are quite comfortable for being somewhat flimsy feeling compared to my usual $40 tennis/ walking shoes I buy. The arch support is surprisingly good and I didn’t need to insert any in soles yet. I would say these are a good value for daily shoes

I was iffy on buying these because of the low price. I got them today and they are COMFORTABLE! The memory foam in the show makes them comfortable to wear all day. They fit just right (I'm a size 9). I will probably order at least 1 more pair in a different color. I can't speak to how long they will last, but for the price I can't beat it.

I really liked most how lightweight these were, very comfortable walking. Not a ton of cushion or structure so I wouldn’t consider them a running shoe unless you’re comparing to or wanting barefoot style. The mesh breathes nicely on the top and my foot stayed cool. Seems like good material that will last a reasonable time. I’m happy with them.

评论概述: Perfect for hard to fit feet
评论详情: Not to bore you with my backstory but I have a hard time finding shoes that fit right. Now that you know that know that I am a harsh critic when it comes to shoes. These are amazing, great fit, comfortable good arch support, great price. I will definitely be buying more of these they are my new favorite shoe. Highly recommend.

I have had three back surgeries and I also walk on the sides of my feet.  These shoes have so much room that the shoe does not hurt my foot when I walk.  The wide shape gives my feet the space they need so they are not uncomfortable.  I also love the color.  They are walking shoes but can totally be used in a business setting.

Ordered these for my mother who has lots of foot issues and pains and she loves them. She said they are wide enough and comfortable and do not cause pain in her feet like most shoes. Highly recommend.

Very very comfortable, they are light weight, yet provide great support to the souls of the feet and give your toes room to breath.  The sizing is spot on and you can stay on your feet with these without feeling any pain or discomfort in your feet.  I love them.

I was looking forward to these JIASUQI Men's Walking Shoes Wide Toe Sneakers with Arch Support. They are close, but they do not quite measure up to what I was expecting.  They are comfortable when standing, but the heels seem lower than what I am accustomed to wearing, When I walk in these shoes I feel like my foot is pointed in the air. I may try to find some old shoe inserts that I stuck in a closet, they are half sole in length and should raise the heel.  The listing describes "...with reinforced heel won’t be deformed when you slip in without bending over, just slip in these and go." When I tried that it did not work, it could be that I need to practice, but for now I have to sit down and put these shoes on.  I realize that we each have different feet and thus different shoes. I think that these shoes will feel more comfortable over time, but I need the time.
